0000000000000000 00000 1 0 0 1 1111111111111111  --reset
0000000000000000 00000 0 0 0 1 1111111111111111  
1000000000000000 00001 1 1 0 0 1111111111111111  --write
1000000000000000 00001 0 1 0 0 1111111111111111   
1000000000000000 00001 1 0 1 0 1000000000000000  --read
1000000000000000 00001 0 0 1 0 1000000000000000  
1100000000000000 00010 1 1 0 0 1000000000000000  --write
1100000000000000 00010 0 1 0 0 1000000000000000   
1100000000000000 00010 1 0 1 0 1100000000000000  --read
1100000000000000 00010 0 0 1 0 1100000000000000  
1110000000000000 00011 1 1 0 0 1100000000000000  --write
1110000000000000 00011 0 1 0 0 1100000000000000  
1110000000000000 00011 1 0 1 0 1110000000000000  --read
1110000000000000 00011 0 0 1 0 1110000000000000
